mapper.select: select tm.m_id as mid,(case when rmid.mid is not null then true else false end ) as checked,tm.m_level as mlevel,tm.m_Name as mname,tm.m_url as murl from tb_module tm left join (select tm.m_id as mid from tb_module tm left join tb_permit_role t on tm.m_id = t.m_id left join tb_role t2 on t.r_id = t2.r_id where t.r_id=#{rid})as rmid on tm.m_id=rmid.mid group by tm.m_id asc;
mapper.delete: delete from tb_role where r_id=#{rid} and r_id!=1;
mapper.select: select td.DeptId as DeptId,td.DeptNumber as DeptNumber,td.DeptName as DeptName from tb_deparment td;

select tu.*,tp.*,tru.*,td.*,tr.* from tb_user tu left join tb_role_user tru on tu.u_id = tru.u_id left join tb_personinfo tp on tu.persoId = tp.persoId left join tb_role tr on tru.r_id = tr.r_id left join tb_deparment td on tu.DeptId = td.DeptId where 1=1
and tp.PersonName like '%'#{personname}'%';
